abstract: Memo From London; British government remains indecisive over plan to add third runway at London's Heathrow Airport despite recent report by independent Airports Commission showing plan would bring enormous economic and social benefits; analysts worry debate between expansion and two other options may further divide Parliament still working out British membership plan with European Union.
lead_paragraph: The contretemps over adding a third runway at London’s Heathrow Airport — a move endorsed by an independent commission on Wednesday — threatens to further divide the Conservative Party.

headline.main: Advice to Build New Heathrow Airport Runway Is Clear. Political Will, Less So.
headline.print_headline: Advice to Add a Runway at Heathrow Is Clear. Political Will, Less So.

snippet: The contretemps over adding a third runway at London’s Heathrow Airport — a move endorsed by an independent commission on Wednesday — threatens to further divide the Conservative Party.
